review: I just got the stick and after spending hours trying to get it to work over two evenings (obviously doing other things at the same time so I wouldn't lose my mind) it still doesn't function properly. The first night I could get Amazon prime to load quickly nothing else would. Since I no longer have prime I didn't watch anything but noticed how rapidly it loaded compared to Netflix. Hmm....interesting.I could never get Netflix or anything else to work, even though my internet connection was fine on my computer and phone.  Tonight I was able to go to Netflix and tune in radio but could not even watch or listen to one program due to the constant buffering. I can watch Netflix on my computer with no buffering so it's not a WiFi issue on my end. This stick is crap and I'm returning it.
author: avid reader

review: Super great for Prime members. HBO collection alone is worth it. Only problem is a green flicker that occurs every couple minutes. Makes it unwatchable. Have to turn everything off and then back on, only to have the green flicker return after a couple minutes. After a little research, find a work around by turning off "pixel orbiter" on my Panasonic ST50 tv. Have not had the problem since, at the expense of rising plasma "burn in" with pixel orbiter turned off.
author: bynum1420

review: Solid product but no internet browser.  you are locked in with whatever shows (netflix, hulu etc)/apps available.  Good selection though.  I wish it has a browser so that my TV can be a smart TV.
author: Amazon Customer "wireless"

review: Obsessed. I like it better than Chromecast. I like the little remote and that there is an app. This is amazing. SO awesome. Use this to watch TV in one room of the house, we use XBOX one in the other. The Fire Stick is much easier to use for hulu/netflix/prime etc than xbox. I love the ease of the remote. It's a great product.
author: MargaretShops

review: Love it. Wish my TV's USB port had enough power but I already have a chase in the wall for wiring so not a big deal. I have DSL and have no buffering issues with it.
author: Phillip C. Pierrard

review: Love it. Works so much quicker than my Roku Stick! Better remote, menu and everything else. Much quicker processing time, less buffering. Was worth every penny.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I love the fire stick itself. Its easy to use, walks you through step by step how to set it up. Its small and hides perfectly  behind my tv. The only issue I have is with the remote. Not sure if its the batteries or something but it has a mind of its own. I got to press on letter and it types it 5 times, or I click to go to the next letter and it skips over it. So instead of taking 30 seconds to search a title it takes like 5 minutes between hitting the backspace and re-clicking the correct letters.
author: Monica
